thread.title: Prosecutors Weigh Child-Pornography Charges Against Anthony Weiner
thread.title_full: Prosecutors Weigh Child-Pornography Charges Against Anthony Weiner - WSJ

author: Erica Orden
title: Prosecutors Weigh Child-Pornography Charges Against Anthony Weiner

organizations.name: weigh child-pornography charges against anthony weiner federal

text:
Federal prosecutors are weighing bringing child-pornography charges against former Rep. Anthony Weiner over sexually explicit exchanges he allegedly had with a 15-year-old girl, according to people familiar with the matter.
Mr. Weiner, a New York Democrat, is being investigated by the U.S. attorneyâ€™s office in Manhattan and the Federal Bureau of Investigation, which seized his electronic devices, including a laptop and a cellphone,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
